mapper.insert: insert into off_review (off_r_no, off_no, userid, target_id, subject, content, writedate) values (off_r_no_sq.nextval, ${off_no}, #{userid},#{target_id},#{subject},#{content},sysdate)
mapper.select: select off_r_no, off_no, userid, target_id, subject, content, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%m%d') writedate from off_review where target_id=#{userid}
select count(*) from off_review where target_id=#{userid}
